# Starview

> Starview is a stargazing location review platform that helps astronomers discover and share the best spots for observing the night sky. Users can find dark sky locations, check real-time sky conditions, and connect with the stargazing community.

## About Starview

Starview is a web application for stargazers, amateur astronomers, and night sky enthusiasts. The platform allows users to:

- Discover stargazing locations with light pollution ratings (Bortle scale 1-9)
- Read and write reviews of stargazing sites
- Check tonight's sky conditions including moon phase, weather, and cloud cover
- Learn about factors affecting stargazing (Bortle scale, moon phases, weather)
- Track visited locations and earn achievement badges
- Follow other stargazers and build a community

## Key Features

### Location Discovery
- Interactive map with clustered markers showing stargazing locations worldwide
- Filter by location type (dark sky sites, observatories, parks, etc.)
- Filter by Bortle class (light pollution rating)
- Search by name, region, or proximity to your location
- Distance calculations and driving directions to locations

### Sky Conditions
- Real-time sky quality assessment based on your location
- Moon phase calendar with illumination percentage
- Weather forecasts optimized for stargazing (cloud cover, humidity, visibility)
- Bortle scale lookup for any coordinates
- "Tonight" dashboard showing if conditions are favorable for stargazing

### Reviews & Community
- User reviews with 1-5 star ratings and photos
- Location check-ins to track your stargazing visits
- Achievement badges for exploration milestones
- User profiles with review history and badge collections
- Follow system to connect with other stargazers

### Educational Content
- Bortle Dark-Sky Scale guide explaining light pollution levels
- Moon phases guide showing how lunar cycles affect stargazing
- Weather factors guide for planning observation sessions

### Location Types Available
- Dark Sky Sites - Designated dark sky preserves and parks
- Observatories - Public and private observatories
- Parks - National, state, and local parks good for stargazing
- Scenic Overlooks - Viewpoints with good sky access
- Remote Areas - Off-grid locations with minimal light pollution

## Technical Details

- **Stack**: Django REST Framework backend, React frontend
- **Data Sources**:
  - Light pollution: World Atlas 2015 data (Bortle scale)
  - Weather: Open-Meteo API
  - Moon phases: Astronomical calculations (ephem library)
  - Geocoding: Mapbox API

## API Information

Starview provides a REST API for location and sky condition data. The API is primarily for internal use but powers all frontend features including:

- Location search and filtering
- GeoJSON data for map rendering
- Moon phase calculations
- Weather forecasts
- Bortle scale lookups
